price: I oni neće imati među svojim božanstvima zagovornika i oni će svoja božanstva nijekati.
arabic: وَلَمۡ يَكُن لَّهُم مِّن شُرَكَآئِهِمۡ شُفَعَٰٓؤُاْ وَكَانُواْ بِشُرَكَآئِهِمۡ كَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walam yakun lahum min shurakāihim shufaʿāu wakānū bishurakāihim kāfirīna
